SEARCH

Package JEST.view

package JEST.view
This package contains the classes adapted to the view of the application : We have the MainWindow and all the panels.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    JEST
    This package contains the general classes of JEST : Main : It asks if the player wants to use the console or the GUI.
    JEST.controller
    This package contains the controller of the application : ConsoleController : It permits the interactions between the user and the console, using the scanner.
    JEST.model
    This package contains the controller of the application : Game : This is the most important class of the game.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ChooseOfferPanel
    This is a panel where the player can choose a card between all the available offers.
    MainWindow
    It creates the window where we add the panel adapted to the game' situation.
    MakeOfferPanel
    This is a panel where the player can make an offer.
    NewGameCreationPanel
    This is the panel where we can create the new Jest game.
    PartyStartPanel
    This is the panel where we have the choice if we want to start a new game or load one.
    TrophyInitializationPanel
    This is the panel with the initialization if the trophies and the display of these.
